A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 18, 2010''', marking the first [[Seecret Friday ]]update.<ref>[[wordofnotch:712687607|Seecret Friday update! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, June 18, 2010</ref> This is the only version of Infdev available in the [[launcher]].

== Additions ==<!--Please do NOT add an additions table here-->
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Rail (NS) JE1.png|32px]] [[Rail]]s'''
* Crafted with [[iron ingot]] and [[stick]].

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Minecart JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Minecart (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[Minecart]]s'''
* Crafted with [[iron ingot]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Iron Ingot
|A3=Iron Ingot
|B3=Iron Ingot
|C2=Iron Ingot
|C3=Iron Ingot
|Output=Minecart}}
* Used as portable storage.
* Right-clicking minecarts opens them like a chest (with the container called "Minecart"). Filling them up makes the "dirt" layer inside of them rise.

'''{{Animate|Sand JE2 BE1.png;Gravel JE2 BE1.png|32px}} [[Falling block|Falling Block]]s'''
* Called "FallingSand".
* Appears when sand or gravel lose their base of support.
* Сan now be dropped by falling onto a torch or a slab.

=== Other ===
'''[[Lower sky]]''' 
* A colored plane below the [[fog]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Door JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Door]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Oak Door JE2.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Ladder (S) JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Ladder]]s'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Ladder (S) JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Obsidian JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Obsidian]]'''
* Now drops itself as opposed to [[Cobblestone]].
* Explosion resistance has been increased. Before this, obsidian had the same blast resistance as [[stone]].

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak JE5.png|32px]] [[Tree]]s'''
* Bug where [[log]]s would not generate inside of the tops of trees is now fixed.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Void]]'''
* Falling into the void now kills the [[player]].

'''[[Sky]]'''
* Appears as a slightly darker variant of light blue.

== Bugs ==
* Placing falling blocks above signs keeps them continuously bouncing until player leaves & rejoins world or breaks sign.
* Near the Far Lands gravity-affected blocks may duplicate items under certain conditions.<ref>{{YouTube link|7an5DMz1l6k|Minecraft gravel duplication glitch|31 March 2024}}</ref>
** This bug remained in the game until [[Java Edition 1.4.5|1.4.5]].
